name: ALIEN SLIME THINGY TRIES TO COMMIT GENOCIDE IN ORDER TO SURVIVE
name_original: ALIEN SLIME THINGY TRIES TO COMMIT GENOCIDE IN ORDER TO SURVIVE
description:
ALIEN SLIME THINGY TRIES TO COMMIT GENOCIDE IN ORDER TO SURVIVE is a game developed by Mridul Pancholi. It came out on 01-11-2020.
You can play ALIEN SLIME THINGY TRIES TO COMMIT GENOCIDE IN ORDER TO SURVIVE on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
